articles.description: Do mask mandates work? While some states have banned schools from requiring masks for students, experts say the practice will keep kids safer.
articles.content: Children under 12 are still not eligible for vaccines against COVID-19. And just in time for back-to-school season, the highly contagious delta variant is causing pediatric cases of the coronavirus t… [+10290 chars]
